comment.text: Fixes: kill_detail item prices work
Fixes: page cache improved for shared boards, deleted kills correctly deleted from summaries, db errors introduced last patch are removed.
Fixes: killlists with both involved corps and alliances work. Memory use reduced.
Fixes: missing code in rankmod located. logo code detects missing gd function, api_alliance labels Faction a Faction
Fixes: Rank mod toplists correctly limit by plt/crp/all, install not incorrectly called automatically. Modifying the cost of a kill updates the summary tables.
Alliance page is named Faction if showing a Faction. Cache options clarified. Page specific cache times re-enabled.
Fixes: php4 errors fixed. Pricing formula fixed.
Fixes: some php4 errors fixed. The great commenting project continues.
Fixes: rank mod incorporates corplogo generation
Fixes: ship value column now bigint, rss feed html matches doctype. install db updated to 1.2:v1.4, faction correctly shown on raw mails, factions stored as alliance
Fixes: upgrade no longer relies on install directory existing, upgrade variables correctly named, legacy code removed, error notices reduced.
Upgrade allows admin to log in if not already logged in.
Latest upgrades incorporated into install. Install is automatically started on boards with no config.
Fixes: Upgrade upgrades. Install style added to upgrade.
Fixes: Upgrade correctly calculates ship loss value
Upgrade uses smaller upgrade steps if installation fails.
Fixes: summary tables correctly filter by ship type
Fixes: Feed syndication password debug code properly removed.
Feed syndication supports usernames & passwords more than 8 characters long
Feed syndication supports http password protected sites (by Icebreaker)
Fixes: Feed version correctly shown. Extra white space in class.comments removed.
Fixes: deleted kills correctly removed from summaries.

Fixes: db debug code no longer errors on some setups. upgrade now gives updates on progress. apicache returned to index.php for better eve api compatibility. cache options now has clear summary cache option. siglist shows correct urls. summary cache correctly updates. feedfetcher excludes kills before exclude date. exclude date on kills works
Fixes: Parser updated with FriedRoadKill's, troubleshooting now correctly uses mysql connection, .htaccess set to disallow viewing of indexes, removed unused code from autoupgrade.
Fixes: Removing two install files incorrectly added.
Fixes: missing kill_export include included, troubleshooting shell_exec replaced, db.php allows >=4.1 instead of >4.1, apiuser mod comments update kill_details cache, ships names updated.

Fixes: install is locked after first run, private cache files made inaccesible, initial summary caching removed from kill posting, board will not attempt to run on MySQL < 4.1, PILOT_ID cannot be set, legacy option removed from admin panel, pos values added to installation defaults

Fixes: autoupgrade smoother, Rare errors in db classes reduced, api login problems reduced, page cache notifications check if cache is active. admin mod list sorted. alliance and corp details pages load faster. all-time summary tables cached. killlist performance on large databases improved
Upgrades now force admin page to be run. Admin menu has an option to list settings for error reporting.
Fixes: autoupgrade works, problem with db.php includes removed. Admin cache menu now has option to clear caches. Install hides passwords

Fixes: HTML, killlists with multiple involved, thumbnail creation delays, mods using short php tags corrected (Tribalize) . Autoupgrade adds missing indexes on upgraded boards. page cache updating algorithm improved, feed log information cleaned up (Oleg)
Fixes: Incorrect indexing on installation files & surplus ')'
Fixes: summary tables have correct width, kb3_config correctly indexed, feed fetcher records foreign address in log
Summary table template.
Fixes: rss feed no longer shows classified kills, default banner corrected. Derelict code removed. Code streamlined. Summary tables moved to a template.
Fixes: kill_detail comment posting works and non-existent kll_id gives correct error, t3 subsystems have correct location, potential conflicts with old mods and db classes removed.
Fixes: sig mod works, apikill setting saved on admin panel, page cache does not attempt to double gzip, banner and award images have size set.
Feed marks api-only feeds. Fetcher properly stores api flag for feed. Searches are trimmed of whitespace. html fix.
Page cache fixes for comments. refresh no longer reposts comment. comments display again. 304 sent for refresh of cached pages. html fixes
Missing file from page cache update
Fetch properly ignores non-api kills when requested. missing subsystem slot icon
Updated installation pilot tables
removing old db install files
page cache enables properly.
Admin setting clarifications, autoupgrade uses existing kill settings.
kill class can constructs all involved pilot/ship/etc objects kill_detail reduced load using new kill method. display fixes.
Feedfetch 1.7 external id support. Reduces potential load problems. Feed fetcher is identified.
Improved support for constructing multiple corp/pilot/etc objects. External ID functions added
API feed caches date properly. Rank mod has missing TopLists. Parser has better spelling.
Improve summary efficiency display - select millions or billions depending on isk value

MyISAM can be selected again on install duplicate item descriptions removed from install alliance/corp/pilot optional installs now have external id and correct structure alliance/corp/pilot/kill details can be selected by external id corp/alliance/kill now have get and set methods for external ids killlist has method to select only kills with an external id set monthly views mod now shows clock and combined kills if selected optimisations and fixes to killlists and toplists
Fix apicache problem in the admin panel Fix initial display of apoc fitting panel
kills posted with external id of null, not 0 kb3_pilots unique index on external id changed to index (default is 0, not null) kb3_kills columns created in correct order
further installation xml files corrections.
further installation xml files corrections.
installation xml files corrected.

- SQL queries optimised for speed and error protection. - feed syndication optimised - front page includes optional clock and optional kill/loss display - mysqli support added - transaction protection of kills added where supported (mysqli and InnoDB) - summary tables and contracts show total destroyed value instead of ship value - html errors reduced - related kill calculation improved - query caching errors reduced - minor bugfixes - Smarty 2.6.25 added - apoc fitting mod added and modded - code optimisations - code comments added (doxygen format) - conflicting mods are now identified

Updated smarty to 2.6.22. Fixed the killsummarytable layout problem. Implemented internal registry, its a place to put temporary variables without polluting the global namespace. Implemented a fix to db_cache::markAffectedTables() from Kovell
Fixed the pre PHP 5.1.0 issue with the current year, it will run on php4 again but stil has the week 52/1 issue (kindof). Removed debug content from globals.php.

Added option for efficiency in KillSummaryTables. The board is now able to get the checked out revision on svn capable systems. Fix for the week 52/1 problem. Added a first draft of the pageAssembly class together with a rework of how home.php would look like.

Fixed apiuser to not enable xajax on all pages Added a html tweak for opera on killsummarytables Reworked ajcron::getNextRun(), it didnt work on values greater than 60 minutes Now no xajax code is inserted when board is in IGB mode
Updated included EVEAPI to 2.71 Included a mod_xajax compatible apiuser mod Tweaked some code of the apiuser mod (menu, xajax, templates) Removed the post.php from the xajax mod.
First working version of ajcron, see http://eve-id.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=505&t=13513 for details
Commit of the reworked ajax mod Preview of the new ajcron mod (80% done)
Update of the supplied Smarty library to 2.6.21 (02.12.2008)
Updated the admin panel. Should now be more "easy" to use.
T2 item shows on T2 blueprints
You can now click on an item in the kill_detail
Fixed the missing items...
removing of unused 24x24 and 48x48 blueprint icons
linking in history-mod about page rev numbers to beansmans trac, cause trac.eve-dev.net is currenty down
removing some old queris from preior CCP dump use (DB_USE_CCP stuff)
path for swf-banner corrected to banner/{banner}
Changed inserts into name adressed ones
Added blueprint icons to the img folder and to template.
Autoupgrade updated, updates blueprint info. Go to admin->Database to run it.
Parser fix from FriedRoadKill
Forgot to remove some personal code ;) Sorry Thunk
Added better support for master killboard sync in the feed.php file (master=1 switch)
Fixed boolean ===
Fixed the cron scripts
Updated comments class without IP
Removed some gfx by owner request.
Removed fitting mod, built in the core now
Updated some install data
Small fixes to make everything work after large update earlier.
Fixed Memcached caching on Comments and the Admin panel (so it dont cache those things)
Changed Millions to Billions
Added seperate password for comments
Fixed banner types (SFV is now working)
Integrated Fitting Mod
Gave appearance related stuff own menu under admin
Possible to turn on/off Summarytables
Capability to change ammount of shown kills/losses on home, kills and losses
Memcached integrated into KB Core
Moved API Mod and Feed Syndication into KB Core and Added Cron Scripts
Moved Banner location from '/img/logo/' to '/banner/'
Fixed bug on Comment box (Where it'd show odd on Firefox under Linux) (bunjiboys)
Fixed some typos and leftover debug in ralles code
InnoDB Engine is now chooseable in installer (inclusive server check for selected Engine)
Possibility to cache killmails (Admin->Cache)
Changed installer step2 sitecheck
MOD: Value fetcher
MOD: API_Mod (and class.eveapi.php in common/includes)
admin_troubleshooting and images
Killboard fetches character id from api
Fixed logo and T2 icon on about pages
Fixed session, now using siteid also
Removed Syncronization from administration menu
Possiblity to browse through old months different alliance and corp detail stats
Optinal to killist: count of involved pilots (by sheezaa)
Ticket #81 : German Killmails (Im Container)=>(In Container) problem solved
fix of forum mod, that it didnt break related kills anymore and some other things
small fixes in known member mod so get it up to date
Ticket #80 : moving more colours to style.css instead of inline HTML in templates, to make easier to customize.
pagesplitter to kill/loss page
Parser: new German killmail with Allianz: Nichts
DB Update004: trinity ships had wrong tech level, wasnt actived...
Feed Syndication didn't filter corp/ally correctly
Fitting Mod Update
Advanced Fitting Mod with Ammo/Slotlayout (made by Wes Lave)
EVE-Api class (beta), see pilot getCharId(), only for testing, its atm commented out
Ticket #74 pilot portrait issues with img url
Ticket #77 small fix in igb template with kb_host
DB Update004: trinity ships had wrong tech level
Ticket #75 Reinforced mode generated errors if /proc/loadavg cannot be read
Mailer sends now the killmail and not the msg that mail is classified, when classification for x hours is enabled.
Ticket #73 Typo in portrait_grab + reformat
Ticket #72 KB_HOST wasn't available in $smarty by default
DB Update003: Warefare Links fixed from mid to highslot
Ticket #71 Kill_detail.tpl Slot,Destroyed,Dropped items has own table-row styles in the style.css's)
Ticket #70 (KB_VERSION not a number)
Ticket #69 (Update Portrait Update)
Ticket #68 (possibility to disabe out of game posting)
Ticket #64 (Problem with IGB links when KB not in web root)
Fitting Mod, preparing slots caused a timeout. related to : http://www.eve-dev.net/e107_plugins/forum/forum_viewtopic.php?7976
DB Update002: status of update wasn't saved before
default settings of feed_sync mod changed to year 2008
Ticket 62 (Update items value for dropped items)
in kill detail templates (base / fitting mod) for update value submit button for dropped items
"Adjust Values" Link, to leave Fix Slot mode as admin in kill detail
DB Update002: fixing slot of already posted Salvager I
merged the last few changes into kill_detail (slotfix) into fitting mod
DB update via autoupgrade.php to fix some slot probs
an error in item->getSlot so always numeric values are given back and not an empty blank
Fixed the export problem: http://www.eve-dev.net/e107_plugins/forum/forum_viewtopic.php?6624
Fixed the version checking from tomx.org, since it's now a commercial ad site!
First rig in fitting window wasnt shown, cause of false index usage
Items without slotID used slot of partent items (attribute used_with..)
Settings of fitting mod, not needed anymore, if already set, you can delete it in the kb3_config
update of item values
fitting mod
item name as tooltip on icons
This changeset history you are reading atm
CCP's new german translation for Drone Bay
Alliance logo in killlist show alliance name as tool tip
not able to post comments when logged in as admin
showing dropped items when nothing else was destroyed
Admin can fix slot in kill_detail
added admin_ to the urls that needed it to get the move pilot working again.
isk readout in the known members mod.
corrected a few kill_import -> admin_kill_import problems
Added a list of malformed files at the end of the import process
customizable rowcount on KillSummaryTable
ship classes shouldnt wrap anymore.
proper png output by the signature generator.
